MAN.TITLE: frmag
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: magnitude of FIR and IIR filters

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : integer (number of points in frequency response)
: mvector of magnitude of frequency response at the points fr
: points in the frequency domain where magnitude is evaluated
: if den is omitted vector coefficients/polynomial/rational polynomial of filter
: if den is given vector coefficients/polynomial of filter numerator

DESCRIPTION.P: calculates the magnitude of the frequency responses of FIR and IIR filters. The filter description can be one or two vectors of coefficients, one or two polynomials, or a rational polynomial.

MAN.AUTHOR: C. B.
